data.claim: Duro is the Builder's Compass made tangible: Memory (facts/episodes/decisions), Verification (validation loops/evaluations), Orchestration (MCP/autonomy), Domain Expertise (skills/rules/constitutions). New positioning: "AI generates. Builders verify. Duro remembers." Philosophy-led GTM builds movement, not just user base.
data.snippet: Synthesis doc at ~/.agent/memory/docs/duro-builders-compass-synthesis.md. Key insight: Mem0/Zep sell memory storage. Duro sells a way of being a builder. Can't clone a philosophy people identify with.
